content: Now that there's a dotnet validator, I'd be happy if someone wanted to make a PR to this page http://build.fhir.org/validation.html to describe how to use it like we describe how to use the java one.
because then we'd have a place to answer this question: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/57953237/i-am-looking-for-fhir-resource-validation-against-fhir-structure-definition
